1 //Directly included within the hpp
2 template <class T>
3 MessageMeanFilter<T>::MessageMeanFilter(ros::NodeHandle &nh):MessageFilterBase<T>(nh)
4 {
5  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
6  if(!priv.getParam("sample_number",this->samples_num_))
7  {
8  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Parameter sample_number is not specified for MeanFilter!");
9  throw std::runtime_error("Parameter sample_number is not specified for MeanFilter!");
10  return;
11  }
12  else
13  {
14  this->buffer_=std::make_unique<boost::circular_buffer<T>>(this->samples_num_);
15  }
16  this->server_.setCallback(boost::bind(&MessageMeanFilter::dynConfigcallback,this,_1,_2));
17 }
18 template <class T>
19 T MessageMeanFilter<T>::filter()
20 {
21  using namespace msg_operators;
22  T ret;
23  // ret=std::accumulate(this->buffer_->begin(),this->buffer_->end(),T(),static_cast<T (*)(T,T)>(&operator+));
24  ret=std::accumulate(this->buffer_->begin(),this->buffer_->end(),T(),static_cast<T (*)(T,T)>(&operator+))/this->samples_num_;
25 
26  ret.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
27  return ret;
28 }
29 template <class T>
30 void MessageMeanFilter<T>::dynConfigcallback(manipulate_topics::MeanConfig &config,uint32_t level)
31 {
32 
33  if(config.samples<1)
34  {
35  this->samples_num_=1;
36  }
37  else
38  {
39  this->samples_num_=config.samples;
40  }
41 
42  this->buffer_->set_capacity(this->samples_num_);
43 }
